mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS id, p.image_full_path AS imageFullPath, p.product_name AS productName, p.price AS price, c.product_count AS productCount, c.product_count * p.price AS subTotal, c.product_id AS productId FROM tbl_cart c INNER JOIN mst_product p ON c.product_id = p.id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.updated_at DESC, c.created_at DESC
